Row.Text: Wh-What's happening? What's happening to me? I don't feel very good... Is something bad happening to Planeptune? What are you doing to Planeptune? My Shares, I... Don't want to die... [NEWLINE][COLOR:127:127:127:255](She collapses over, her body beginning to fade away.)[ENDCOLOR]

What are you doing to Planeptune? You're so meeeaaan, Planeptune didn't deserve this... Why is it getting hard to think? I can't... Why are you such an awful person? I didn't want this... I just wanted everyone to be friends... [NEWLINE][COLOR:127:127:127:255](She curls up into a ball trying to keep away from you as she slowly fades away.)[ENDCOLOR]

Oh, helloooo! It's good to see another person in this world. I'm Plutia, and I'm the CPU of Planeptune! Or one of them, anyway... Wow, you're the leader of a country too? That's so cooool, I hope we can be friends... More friends to have naps with is always gooood... Oh, speaking of... [NEWLINE][COLOR:127:127:127:255](She starts to look really sleepy and seems to be nodding off.)[ENDCOLOR]

Hey there! I'm Plutia, the CPU of Planeptune! From the look of it, you seem like a world leader too! I'm not the best at this, so let's be friends, all right? I don't like fighting very much, so... It woooould be best if everyone got along, don't you agreeee?

Hellooo there! It's good to see a friendly face today... Are you here on official business, or were you looking for a place to stay for a while? I'm much better with the latter than the former, I'm afraaaaaid.... I'll try my best with the official stuff, thoooough... Or Histy will help at least...

[COLOR:127:127:127:255](She rubs her eyes, still looking groggy from the obvious nap she she just woke up from.)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] Oh, it's yooouu, helllooo. Sorry, I just woke up from a pretty long nap, so I'm still pretty sleepy. Histy should be around, somewhere... She handles basically everythiiiing, so...

Oh, it's one of my best friends, helllooo! What brings you to my Planeptune? If you're not here on official business, would you look at this doll I'm making? There's something just a little bit offff, and I can't tell what...
Hey there! Welcome to Planeptune.
Oh, a visitor! What brings you to Planeptune today?
Ah, you're another world leader, right? Did you want to discuuuusss something? I'm not very gooood at that sort of thing though...
Oh noooo, not you... You're not a very nice person, and I wish you weren't here right now...
You realize you're interfering with my naaaap time, don't you? It might be better to leave before you leeeaaarn that's a bad idea...
Oh... Histy? Someone meeaan showed up and I don't want to talk to them...
You're attacking my Planeptune?! Whyyyyy? I don't want to fight you... You're such a mean person, and... And... You're making me very angry...
[COLOR:127:127:127:255](She grips a doll tightly, and looks to be pretty scared of you.)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] No! Go awaaaay! Leave me alone!
You're such an awful person, Planeptune doesn't deserve this... But since you're forcing me, I'll just take out my stress on something else instead of a doll for a change...
You... You... Just make so... ANGRY! I don't like having to do it, but I'm going to teach you a real lesson...
You just like picking on weaker people, don't you? I just want everyone to be nice to each other, but since you won't cooperate... Maybe beating up a bully won't be so baaaad after all...
You're such a horrible, no gooood person... So I don't really feel too bad about beating you up... Hopefully you'll learn to be a little nicer after some of my "service"...

You're such an awful, horrible, terrible person... I don't like you at aaaalll... [NEWLINE][COLOR:127:127:127:255](She seems to be twisting off the head of a doll slowly while glaring at you.)[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You're soooo gross... I can barely even stand talking to you right now... Everyone is going to know how terrible you are...[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Whaaaaat? How could you say something like that? You're sooooo mean...
Hah... Hahaha... You really think you're going to get away with saying all those nasty things about Planeptune? I'm very...protective...
Woooow, what is all this stuff from your country? It's really coooool... Although it's kind of everywhere in Planeptune now... Histy seems a bit upset, but I don't mind too much...
Histy said something about "territory expansion" and "diplomatic breakdowns"... Those words are too big for me, but I signed the documents like she wanted... Hopefully you don't mind too much...
I can tell you're a bad person...and bad people need to be punished... Hahaha...
This was a nice deal for me, could we renew it, pleeeease?...
Oh, that's a nice trade... Suuuure, let's do it!
Histy said that's an "acceptable trade", so I'll take it...
Thank you very much!
Thaaaanks!
Oh wow, that's so niiiice of you!
Ehehehe... You're a pretty nice person...
I don't really understand what you're trying to do... You aren't trying to trick me, are yoooouuuu?...
Histy says I need to be careful about trades... So I'm trying to be extra diligent...
It might be a lot to ask, but Planeptune could really use this... You'll help us out, right?...
Will you be good and listen to me, or do I neeeeed to keep punishing you a little more...?
Nooo... I didn't do anything baaaad... Why is this happening...?
Planeptune, no... Please don't destroy Planeptune!...
I... I'll be good... Please stop... Don't hurt me anymore...
Huuuhh?... Why would you visit Planeptune when we're fighting each other?...
Oh noooo... The bad person is here... Hiiisty, is it ok if I transform now?...
*sob* This is what you wanted, right? Just take it... I don't want to fight anymore...
I don't reeeaaallly get it, but... Histy said we needed to re-ne-go-ti-ate... I think that means she wants me to get more stuff?...
Oh woooow, that's a lot of stuff... I don't think Planeptune can match that though...
Ohhh... That looks nice!... Could we trade, pleeeaase?
Well, um... I'd like to, but... Histy says I can't, sooooo... Sorry....
Eehehehe... {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} has been reeeaaallly bad, so I hope you won't mind if I punish them just a little biiiit extra...
That's a really biiiig military... Why is it liiiike that?... Please don't do anything bad with it...
That's a loooot of money you have! What are you going to do with it?... Don't spend it all in one place!...
Whhhhhyyy are you here? You know I don't like it when people fight... and I'm already reaaallly angry...
Doooonn't fight people! Fighting is bad! Make up with them right nooooow!...
Wellll, having a small army isn't so bad... You shouldn't be fighting people anywaaaay... Ehehehe...
You keep fighting all those people... That's so meeaan, and wrong, and... Not nice! Maybe you should try apologiiiiizing or I'll get even more maaaad...
You're friends with {1_CivName} too? That's greaaaat, we should have a nap pile sometiiiime...
Noooo, don't be friends with {1_CivName}! They're really bad people and you shouldn't be friends with someone like that...
You're such a nice person and I really like you, soooo... Can we be friends, pleeease? I'd love to have more friends to nap with...
Histy says we need to sign some formaaaal documents or whatever, but after that, we can be friends, riiiight?...
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has been very baaaad, and they need to be punished... You'll help me, won't yoooouuu?...

I don't really want to talk to you anymoooore. All you doooo is make me angry and I don't have a doll around right now... [COLOR:127:127:127:255](She leers at you, and you get the sudden sense of foreboding that this is the worse place you could possibly be.)[ENDCOLOR]
